What's BingX?

BingX is a global digital asset trading platform offering innovative tools and services for spot and derivatives trading.

  • Spot and advanced trading
  • Competitive fees
  • Robust security measures
  • User-friendly experience

API Key Setup Process

Follow the steps below to create and configure your API keys for BingX.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. We use industry-standard encryption to secure your credentials.' %}

1 Create a BingX Account

If you don’t already have a BingX account, please sign up here.

2 Navigate to API Management

  1. Log in to your BingX account.
  2. Hover over your profile icon in the top-right corner and select API Management.
  3. Click Create API.

3 Create Your API Key

  1. Enter a name for your API key (e.g., “Trading Bot Key”).
  2. Set a secure API passphrase and choose the permissions required (read, trade, etc.).
  3. Ensure you understand the permissions granted and keep your passphrase safe.

4 Enable IP Restrictions and Confirm

  1. To enhance security, we strongly recommend adding an IP whitelist.
  2. Complete any required security verifications like email or Google Authenticator code.
  3. Once verified, click Confirm to complete API key creation.

Complete the Integration

Copy your API Key and Secret and paste them into your Etradingview dashboard. Keep them secure and never share them with anyone.
